name: Chonky-19
description:
It's time for the Chonks to take on the virus with their own paws! What is Chonky-19?

Chonky-19 is the name of our 3D shooter game created in Unity with a theme of COVID-19. We wanted to focus our game on the current pandemic as it is still a prevalent issue, hopefully educating our users on how to stay safe during this time.

Help Granny in Pandemic! Eliminate the Virus! Levels Get Harder as Virus Spreads! Choose your Favorite Chonky
  • WASD TO RUN
  • LEFT CLICK TO SHOOT
  • E TO PICKUP ITEMS
  • EXPLORE MORE IN THE GAME!
Adopted Siblings who kind of care for Granny Caramel - Oldest Brother
  • Average, But A Leader
  • Nothing Remarkable, But Does His Best
Acorn - Too Good For Anyone
  • A Little Sassy
  • Super Confident
Telix - Scaredy Cat
  • Sensitive And Shy
  • Yongest, Yet Talented
See Our Awesome Team Music Credit
